headline: Is EPAM (EPAM) Using the National Geographic Deal to Redefine Its Experience-Led Tech Narrative?
summary: National Geographic Society and EPAM Systems previously announced a multi-year partnership naming EPAM as the Society’s preferred digital transformation partner, using advanced technologies to modernize infrastructure and create immersive educational experiences, including EPAM-powered interactive ecosystems at the National Geographic Museum of Exploration. This collaboration not only supports National Geographic’s conservation-focused storytelling but also gives EPAM a high-profile platform...
